title: Is 'Meira Kumar' Hindu or Christian? - Quora

response.answer_text: Meira Kumar Wiki, Age, Caste, Biography, Husband  Name Meira Kumar (wiki) Date of Birth 31 March 1945 Age 72 Hometown Patna State Bihar Nationality India Political Party Indian National Congress Place of Birth Patna, Bihar, British India Religion Hindu Caste Dalit Profession Advocate, Politician Spouse Name Manjul Kumar (husband) Parents Jagjivan Ram (father)Indrani Devi (mother) Meira Kumar Family and Earlier Life Meira was born on 31 March 1945 in Arrah, Bihar, India. Her parents Jagjivam Ram (Father) is former Deputy Prime Minister of India and her mother Indrani Devi was a freedom fighter. She was belongs to Dalit community/ caste and her father Jagjivan Ram is a prominent Dalit leader in late 90s. She went of Welham Girls School, Dehradun and Maharani Gayatri Devi Girls’ Public School in Jaipur for her schooling. Then joined Indraprastha College for her M.A. went to Miranda House, Delhi University for L.L.B. She is layer by profession, former diplomat and received an honorary doctorate from Banasthali Vidyapith in 2010. Meira was married to Manjul Kumar (husband) and she has one son and two daughter.
